metatags.twitter:title: Fact Check: No, young shepherd in viral photo is not France’s education minister
metatags.og:title: Fact Check: No, young shepherd in viral photo is not France’s education minister
metatags.og:description: A collage of two photographs apparently depicting the struggle story of French politician Najat Vallaud-Belkacem is going viral on social media. The post claims that a young girl shepherd from Morocco grew up to be France’s education minister 20 years later. India Today’s Anti Fake News War Room (AFWA) has found that the young girl in the first photograph is not Najat Vallaud-Belkacem.
metatags.twitter:creator: @indiatoday
metatags.news_keywords: French politician Najat Vallaud-Belkacem, French politician viral photo, Najat Vallaud-Belkacem photo, French politician shepherd, fact check

The post claims that a young girl shepherd from Morocco grew up to be France’s education minister 20 years later. India Today’s Anti Fake News War Room (AFWA) has found that the young girl in the first photograph is not Najat Vallaud-Belkacem.
